description.value:
School evocation [electricity, sonic]; Level druid 4, hunter 4, magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S, M/DF (a piece of a tree struck by lightning)

Range medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)
Effect 5-ft.-diameter sphere
Duration 1 round/level
Saving Throw Reflex negates and Fortitude negates (see text);  Spell Resistance yes

Description

This spell functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.66pt5ntiacbzsuov]{aggressive thundercloud}, except it deals 6d6 points of electricity damage to any creature it strikes. The first creature damaged by the cloud is also stunned for 1 round (Fortitude negates); this is a sonic effect.
